entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
